title: 米上院銀行委員会長、仮想通貨「クラリティ法案」で銀行幹部らと協議
contentSnippet: 米上院銀行委員長がビットコインなど仮想通貨の市場構造を定める法案で銀行業界と協議し、進展があったと報告した。ステーブルコイン利回りやDeFiが法案の争点となっている。

title: SEC Approves DTCC Pilot to Record US Securities on Select Blockchains Via 'Registered' Wallets
contentSnippet: The three-year program will allow the market’s central clearinghouse to create tokenized entitlements under modified regulatory oversight.

title: 米CFTC、仮想通貨取引の引き渡し規則を撤廃　規制緩和へ
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが仮想通貨の「現物引き渡し」に関する2020年ガイダンスを撤回。ファム委員長代行は「時代遅れで過度に複雑」と指摘し、規制簡素化へ。12月には現物取引承認やパイロットプログラム開始など、トランプ政権下で仮想通貨規制の整備が加速。

title: コインベース、チェーンリンクのクロスチェーン技術を採用　ラップドトークンのサービス拡充へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所コインベースはチェーンリンクのクロスチェーン技術を採用。ビットコインのcbBTCやイーサリアムのcbETHなどラップドトークンの送金に活用する。

title: 米決済機関DTCCがトークン化サービス開始へ、SECから許可
contentSnippet: 米預託信託決済機構DTCCの子会社DTCがSECから無措置書簡を取得し、DTC管理下の実世界資産をトークン化する新サービスの提供が承認された。2026年後半にサービス展開を開始する予定だ。

title: ビットコイン、年末サンタ・ラリーの可能性低下　FRB利下げ後＝アナリスト分析
contentSnippet: FRBが25ベーシスポイントの利下げを実施した後、ビットコインが約9万ドルまで下落した。アナリストは年末のサンタ・ラリーが起こりにくいと分析しており、強気の確信は2026年初頭に先送りされている。

title: CFTC Gives No-Action Leeway to Polymarket, Gemini, PredictIt, LedgerX Over Data Rules
contentSnippet: The CFTC granted the operators of Polymarket, PredictIt, Gemini and LedgerX permission to skip certain recordkeeping requirements.

title: ステート・ストリートとギャラクシー、トークン化キャッシュ運用ファンドをローンチへ　まずはソラナに対応
contentSnippet: ステート・ストリートとギャラクシーは、トークン化したキャッシュ運用ファンドのローンチ計画を発表。まずは仮想通貨ソラナのブロックチェーンに対応し、将来的にはステラやイーサリアムなどにも拡大するとした。

title: Google's New Browser Promises to End the Tyranny of the Tab
contentSnippet: Google's Disco builds custom apps from your open tabs, hinting at a post-search future.

title: Do Kwon Sentenced to 15 Years in Prison Over $40 Billion Terra Crypto Collapse
contentSnippet: Terraform Labs founder Do Kwon was sentenced to 15 years in prison, following the $40 billion collapse of UST and Luna in May 2022.

title: Terraform co-founder sentenced to 15 years in prison after guilty plea
contentSnippet: A federal judge heard statements from some of Terraform Labs’ and Do Kwon’s victims for hours before deciding on the co-founder’s sentence.

title: Terraform's Do Kwon Sentenced to 15 Years in Prison for Fraud
contentSnippet: The Terraform Labs co-founder pleaded guilty to conspiracy and wire fraud in August.

title: 米大手銀バンク・オブ・アメリカ、ビットコイン担保融資の準備進める＝報道
contentSnippet: 資産規模1.7兆ドルのバンク・オブ・アメリカがビットコイン担保融資商品の準備を進めていると報じられた。主要米銀行による仮想通貨担保融資の提供は、仮想通貨と伝統金融の統合における重要な一歩となる。

title: Bitcoin, blockchain should form Pakistan’s new financial rail, minister says
contentSnippet: The remarks signal Pakistan’s push to turn its grassroots crypto activity into a compliant, innovation-driven sector anchored by Bitcoin and digital-asset regulation.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Save the Children Launches Bitcoin Fund as Aid Groups Look for Faster Crisis Payments
contentSnippet: Save the Children introduced a Bitcoin fund aimed at speeding cash assistance during emergencies and expanding its use of crypto tools.

title: XRP buy signal flashes as funding rate turns deeply negative: Will bulls step in?
contentSnippet: XRP’s slide below $2 pushed its funding rates to extreme lows, an occurrence that generally incentivizes bulls to pile in. What’s holding traders back this time?

title: U.S. Financial-Risk Watchdog, FSOC, Erased Digital Assets as a Potential Hazard
contentSnippet: From Donald Trump's crypto-friendly regulators, the yearly report that once flagged financial-stability risks is no longer issuing "vulnerability" warnings.

title: Netflix teases comedy movie about missing $35M crypto password
contentSnippet: The film, titled "One Attempt Remaining," about a couple trying to regain access to millions of dollars worth of crypto, mirrors real-world crypto dilemmas.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds to $93K From Post-Fed Lows, but Altcoins Remain Under Pressure
contentSnippet: Downward pressure on bitcoin is losing steam, with the market stabilizing but not yet out of the woods, said one analyst.

title: 英上場企業サツマ・テクノロジー、保有BTCの約半数を売却　社債返済目的で
contentSnippet: 英国のビットコイン関連技術企業サツマ・テクノロジーが11日、保有する1199BTCのうち579BTCを売却し、約4000万ポンドの純収入を得たと発表した。売却後も620BTCを保有し現金約9000万ポンドを確保している。

title: HIVE tests investor appetite for AI-Bitcoin infrastructure in Andean markets
contentSnippet: HIVE’s Colombia listing provides Andean investors with access to the growing digital infrastructure sector as Bitcoin miners shift their focus toward AI and HPC.

title: Xiaomi to pre-install Sei crypto wallet on millions of phones in global rollout
contentSnippet: The partnership gives Sei direct mobile distribution across key crypto markets and includes plans to pilot stablecoin payments in 2026.

title: 21シェアーズがXRP現物ETFを上場、「TOXR」で取引開始
contentSnippet: スイスの資産運用会社21シェアーズが11日、XRP現物ETFを米CBOE取引所に上場した。コインベース、アンカレッジ・デジタル・バンク、ビットゴーがカストディアンを務める。

title: Myriad Moves: Will Santa Bring a Pump or Dump for Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana?
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Ethereum's next move, if Bitcoin is headed back to $100K, and Solana’s next milestone.

title: Ether price trend forecasts triple-digit rally as ETH ETF inflows resume
contentSnippet: Spot ETH ETF inflows resumed, while demand for taker volume improved. Will Ether’s futures markets follow the trend and kickstart a rally toward new all-time highs?

title: JPモルガンがソラナ上で初の債券発行を実施、77億円相当のコマーシャルペーパー
contentSnippet: JPモルガン・チェースが11日、ギャラクシー・デジタル向けに5000万ドルのコマーシャルペーパーを初めてソラナブロックチェーン上で発行したと発表した。

title: J.P. Morgan taps Solana for Galaxy’s tokenized corporate bond issuance
contentSnippet: The tokenized commercial bond is one of the earliest transactions of its kind in the budding sector of onchain debt and credit instruments.

title: Chainlink's LINK Drops 5% Despite Coinbase Bridge Deal, But Bottoming Signs Emerge
contentSnippet: Coinbase tapped Chainlink services for $7 billion bridge, but broader crypto weakness weighed on price.

title: U.S. CFTC's Pham Moves for Do-Over on 'Actual Delivery' Guidance on Crypto
contentSnippet: In what are likely her final days at the agency, the acting chairman checked another box from President Donald Trump's crypto agenda.

title: Coinbase Expands Reach of Stablecoin-Based AI Agent Payments Tool
contentSnippet: The updated protocol, x402 V2, allows developers to combine payments, enable secure wallet access, and add new features via a clean, modular design.

title: Do Kwon’s Sentencing Hearing Drags on as Court Weighs Mountain of Victim Testimony
contentSnippet: District Judge Paul Engelmeyer offered the Terraform Labs co-founder the chance to postpone his sentencing date, in light of hundreds of victim impact statements shared with the court in the past 24 h

title: U.S. Senate Rolls Toward Last Vote on Confirming Crypto Regulators at CFTC, FDIC
contentSnippet: In the prolonged process of the Senate, two key officials have faced a series of procedural steps on their way to a final vote, possibly early next week.

title: JPMorgan Pushes Deeper Into Tokenization With Galaxy's Debt Issuance on Solana
contentSnippet: Galaxy’s onchain debt deal, where JP Morgan acted as arranger, was settled in USDC stablecoin and backed by Coinbase and Franklin Templeton.

title: Vote on Trump’s CFTC chair pick could come today, US senator says
contentSnippet: Senators could vote on Michael Selig's nomination to head the CFTC, which, if successful, is expected to lead to the departure of acting Chair Caroline Pham.

title: Binance Deepens Ties to Trump-Backed Stablecoin Following Founder’s Pardon
contentSnippet: World Liberty Financial’s USD1 stablecoin is now a part of Binance’s core infrastructure, the President Trump-backed crypto project said.

title: Bitcoin Isn’t Buying What the Fed Is Selling: Here’s What the Charts Suggest Happens Next
contentSnippet: So much for that post-Fed relief rally. Bitcoin and Ethereum are again trending downwards, and the charts suggest bears are in control.

title: Klarna Teams With Stripe’s Privy to Build Crypto Wallet ‘For the Masses’
contentSnippet: Swedish fintech firm Klarna is working towards the launch of its own crypto wallet with Stripe-owned wallet infrastructure firm, Privy.

title: Disney Targets Google Over AI Copyright Violations—Alongside $1 Billion OpenAI Deal
contentSnippet: Disney says Google’s AI used its characters without permission, as it signed a new deal with OpenAI to allow character generation with Sora.

title: Some Bitcoin Buying Firms Are Selling as Losses Pile Up on Paper: Report
contentSnippet: A report found that most Bitcoin-stacking firms sit on unrealized losses, with a handful selling the asset as its price fell last month.
